description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Hole-in-one" mini-game!
I'm Tiger. I'm a genius pro golfer who's sunk a hole-in-one on even the toughest courses.
Today's hole... right on the edge of a cliff, huh? And there's some wind, too.
Alright, I accept this challenge!
The key here is power. Gather your strength, factor in the wind... and now's the moment!
name: Additional mini-game "Hole-in-one"
